# code-editor

代码编辑器

## 安装
```javascript
  npm i @mybricks/code-editor
```

## 接口定义
```typescript

type numOrStr = number | string;

interface Props {
  width?: numOrStr;
  height?: numOrStr;
  value?: string;
  language?: string;
  fontSize: numOrStr;
  theme?: 'light' | 'vs-dark';
  readOnly?: boolean;
  tabSize?: number;
  onChange?: (v: string) => void;
}
```
## 使用

```typescript
  import Editor from '@mybricks/code-editor'

  export default function App() {
    return (
      <Editor 
        width={500} 
        height={400}
        fontSize={16}
        language="javascript"
        theme="vs-dark"
      />
    )
  }

```
